posts.post_title: Mayos for Sale (4) - SOLD !! Thanks N54!!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: David Seaborn
I just posted four graded Mayos for sale on eBay (under the eBay ID 'oldoriole').  No reserve, high bidder gets them so check it out.  Hoping a board member wins each of them as I've had them for quite a while.  Grades are:

Joyce - PSA 5
Long - PSA 4
Russie - SGC 50
Rusie - SGC 40

Thanks, Dave

posts.post_title: Mayos for Sale (4) - SOLD !! Thanks N54!!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: David Seaborn
Hey murcerfan,

I do post many of my items here on the board, including many old judges and T206's just this week.  With the Mayo's and their crazy prices, it's difficult to gauge what an appropriate selling price would be.  In these instances, I put it on eBay and let the market decide.  I'm hoping they wind up with an N54er, I think the chances are pretty good that will still happen.
